channel.title: 美联社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪美联社news的种子

item.title: 威尔士王妃凯特透露她正在接受癌症治疗。今年 1 月，王宫宣布凯特将离开人们视线数月，以恢复手术后的状态。
item.description:
Kate, Princess of Wales, disclosed that she is being treated for cancer. The announcement came as rumor and speculation had grown after the palace announced in January that Kate would be out of sight for months recovering from surgery. https://t.co/uj9O4FXy1i

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 23, 2024

item.description:

item.title: 俄罗斯和中国周五否决了一项由美国发起、支持在以色列-哈马斯战争中 "立即和持续停火 "的联合国决议，称这一措施模棱两可，并表示这不是世界上大多数国家所寻求的结束战斗的直接要求。
item.description:
Russia and China vetoed a U.S.-sponsored U.N. resolution on Friday that supported “an immediate and sustained cease-fire” in the Israel-Hamas war, calling the measure ambiguous and saying it was not the direct demand to end the fighting that much of the world seeks. pic.twitter.com/C6sF6eCddh

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 特朗普说他有近 5 亿美元现金，但不想用来支付纽约州的判决

item.title: 俄罗斯官员称，莫斯科音乐厅周五发生袭击事件，造成至少 40 人死亡，100 多人受伤。俄罗斯当局正在调查此次袭击是否属于恐怖主义，这是近年来俄罗斯发生的死亡人数最多的一次袭击。
item.description:
Russian officials say at least 40 people are dead and more than 100 are wounded after an attack Friday at a Moscow concert hall. The attack — which Russian authorities are investigating as terrorism — is the deadliest in Russia in recent years. pic.twitter.com/2eg7gmgVQU

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 威尔士王妃凯特周五表示，她患有癌症，正在接受化疗。自上个月国王查尔斯三世宣布正在接受一种不明类型的癌症治疗以来，这一消息再次令王室成员感到震惊。
item.description:
Kate, the Princess of Wales, said Friday she has cancer and is undergoing chemotherapy.

The news is another shock for the royal family since the announcement last month that King Charles III was being treated for an unspecified type of cancer. https://t.co/XnSEYEIWBu pic.twitter.com/xto7oZvljt

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 威尔士王妃凯特周五表示，她患有癌症，正在接受化疗。自今年 1 月凯特王妃因不明原因的腹部手术住院以来，社交媒体上关于她的行踪和健康状况的猜测已经持续了数周。
item.description:
Kate, the Princess of Wales, said Friday she has cancer and is undergoing chemotherapy. The video announcement came after weeks of speculation spread on social media about her whereabouts and health since she was hospitalized in January for unspecified abdominal surgery. pic.twitter.com/avEJxHJ8IR

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：威尔士王妃凯特说她得了癌症，正在接受化疗。自今年 1 月凯特王妃因不明原因的腹部手术住院以来，人们对她的行踪和健康状况进行了数周的猜测。
item.description:
BREAKING: Kate, the Princess of Wales, says she has cancer and is undergoing chemotherapy. The video announcement came after weeks of speculation about her whereabouts and health since she was hospitalized in January for unspecified abdominal surgery. https://t.co/RQjVVOteAx

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 22, 2024
